title: Cola & Vanilla Nicotine Pouches By 77
description: TRY 77 COLA & VANILLA NICOTINE POUCHES Cola & Vanilla nicotine pouches by 77 You will find the most perfect blend of cola and vanilla combined with extra strong nicotine content. These tobacco-free pouches can always be carried with you and enjoyed everywhere. View all 77 Pouches View all Fruity Pouches View all Drinks Pouches View all Extra Strong Pouches KEY FEATURES: 20MG Per Gram | 13MG Per Pouch Cola & Vanilla flavoured nicotine pouches Recommended for experienced users Tobacco-free, smoke-free and vapour-free 20 pouches in each can MORE ABOUT COLA & VANILLA FLAVOURED NICOTINE POUCHES Trying to describe what cola tastes like is proven to be most difficult since cola is created from a vast compound of different flavours. Cola has aromas from citrus fruits, like lemon, orange, and lime, and from spices such as cinnamon and nutmeg, even vanilla can be hinted from the sweet blend that is cola. MORE ABOUT 77 NICOTINE POUCHES 77 were the first polish brand of tobacco-free nicotine pouches. 77 offers one of the most diverse ranges of flavour on the market, 77 also hit the sweet spot with their nicotine levels. Switch up, switch down, mix and match â€“ do whatever suits you best! Flavours range from different types of mint to peach, apple, strawberries, and even classic tobacco.
